channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- ThinkPad T470p
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- ThinkPad T470p

item.title: CVE-2019-6188|2024-08-04T20:16:24.282Z -- lenovo -- thinkpad%20t470p
item.description: The BIOS tamper detection mechanism was not triggered in Lenovo ThinkPad T460p, BIOS versions up to R07ET90W, and T470p, BIOS versions up to R0FET50W, which may allow for unauthorized access.
